name: manuals-mcp
description: MCP server for accessing hardware and software documentation
long_description: Access comprehensive hardware documentation including pinouts, specifications, and datasheets. Search across devices, get GPIO mappings, and manage documentation with AI-friendly tools.

api_url.title: API URL
api_url.description: Manuals API server URL (e.g., http://localhost:8080 or http://manuals.local:8080)

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Your Manuals API key for authentication. Leave empty for anonymous read-only access.

tools.name: search_manuals
tools.description: Search across all hardware and software documentation

tools.name: list_devices
tools.description: Browse all devices in the documentation library

tools.name: get_device
tools.description: Get complete documentation for a specific device

tools.name: get_pinout
tools.description: Get GPIO pinout table for a hardware device

tools.name: get_specs
tools.description: Get technical specifications for a device

tools.name: list_documents
tools.description: List available PDF documents and datasheets

tools.name: get_status
tools.description: Get API health status and database statistics

tools.name: info
tools.description: Get MCP server version and connection info

tools.name: my_capabilities
tools.description: Show available tools based on your role

tools.name: ingest_workflow
tools.description: Get step-by-step guidance for adding new documentation

tools.name: trigger_reindex
tools.description: Trigger a background reindex of documentation (requires RW role)

tools.name: get_reindex_status
tools.description: Check the status of the reindex operation (requires RW role)

tools.name: upload_file
tools.description: Upload a file to documentation storage (requires RW role)

tools.name: publish
tools.description: Upload and auto-reindex documentation (requires RW role)

tools.name: publish_batch
tools.description: Upload multiple files and reindex (requires RW role)

tools.name: sync_to_git
tools.description: Commit and push documentation changes to git (requires RW role)

tools.name: list_users
tools.description: List all user accounts (requires Admin role)

tools.name: create_user
tools.description: Create a new user account (requires Admin role)

tools.name: delete_user
tools.description: Delete a user account (requires Admin role)
